titles.title: Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-13, by Mr. Arcuri.
The resolution authorizes the Speaker to entertain motions that the House suspend the rules at any time on the legislative day of Friday, February 16, 2007, for consideration of the bill H.R. 976.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 10.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 161.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 188 (Roll no. 100).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 220 - 184 (Roll no. 101).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/16/2007--Passed House without amendment. Makes it in order at any time on February 16, 2007, for the Speaker of the House of Representatives to entertain motions that the House suspend the rules relating to H.R. 976 (Small Business Tax Relief Act of 2007).
